name: computer dreams screensaver pack
description:
Screensaver pack made for #screensaverjam -- a repurposing of other projects, respectively an unpublished VJ thing, Wish Fishing and Naïade.

✾ install instructions ✾

// WINDOWS:
· right-click the .scr file and hit "install". Be careful to keep each data folder with its respective scr file or it won't launch.

// OSX:
· get AppStartSaver
· System Preferences → Desktop and Screen Saver → Screen Saver Options → Set Path
· pick the screensaver app of you choice

// LINUX:
· make sure you have xScreensaver installed (or get it - probably here?)
· follow these steps

All screensavers exit automatically when any input is detected.
